00030 {
00031   UpperBound,
00032   LowerBound,
00033   Assigned,
00034   DomainChanged,
00035   DomainRemoval
00036 };

00039 {
00040     TO_Default,
00041     TO_Store,
00042     TO_Backtrack
00043 };

00045 static const int NoDomainValue = -98765;
00046 #define BAD_POINTER (void*)(-1)
00047 
00048 #ifdef BTWLDEF
00049 #define BTWL(x) x
00050 #define BT_FUNDEF , TrigOp op = TO_Default
00051 #define BT_FUNDEF_NODEFAULT , TrigOp op
00052 #define BT_CALL , op
00053 #define BT_CALL_STORE , TO_Store
00054 #else
00055 #define BTWL(x)
00056 #define BT_FUNDEF
00057 #define BT_FUNDEF_NODEFAULT
00058 #define BT_CALL
00059 #define BT_CALL_STORE
00060 #endif
00061 
00062 enum BoundType
00063 {
00064   Bound_Yes,
00065   Bound_No,
00066   Bound_Maybe
00067 };
00068 
00069 enum PropagationLevel
00070 { PropLevel_None, PropLevel_GAC, PropLevel_SAC, PropLevel_SSAC,
00071 PropLevel_SACBounds, PropLevel_SSACBounds };
00072 
00073 inline PropagationLevel GetPropMethodFromString(std::string s)
00074 {
00075   if(s == "None") return PropLevel_None;
00076   else if(s == "GAC") return PropLevel_GAC;
00077   else if(s == "SAC") return PropLevel_SAC;
00078   else if(s == "SSAC") return PropLevel_SSAC;
00079   else if(s == "SACBounds") return PropLevel_SACBounds;
00080   else if(s == "SSACBounds") return PropLevel_SSACBounds;
00081   else
00082     throw parse_exception(s + " is not a valid Propagation Method");
00083 }
